subject: Re: Can anyone help me see how to usefully work with JUnit in a big project, please?
msgSnippet: Hiya, Joe Thanks for this info - the antipattern you re describing does indeed sound awfully familiar, and is making us do a lot of Mocking. Hmmm...
messageBody:
Hiya, Joe

Thanks for this info - the antipattern you're describing does indeed
sound awfully familiar, and is making us do a lot of Mocking.

Hmmm... consultancy - Now that IS a good idea! It's something we
discussed in the team a while back, and management were making hopeful
noises about. My plan was to speak with Da Boss on Monday about all
this, and but I've just this moment heard that he's out all next week
(new baby - awww!), so it might have to wait a bit. But I'm pretty sure
I will be back to you about this, as soon as I can get to discuss it
with management.

I'm feeling much more positive now - thank you!
Thanks again,
Tracey
